Info:
Samridhi Boutique in Jawahar Nagar Colony Varanasi

For hiring costumes and accessories Samridhi Boutique in Jawahar Nagar Colony Varanasi is one of the city's most recognised stores in business since 2010. This venture was born out of the incredible desire of the promoters to create creatively designed and bespoke costumes dresses and make them available to one and all. This retailer specialises in designing and customising costumes for fancy dress competitions traditional and regional wear dance costumes and wedding attires. Observing utmost attention to hygiene and quality this firm keeps the costumes and dresses as good as new. There are innovative design variants and styles that keep with the evolving trends catering to most occasions and almost all age groups. Their clientele primarily comprises of school students colleges students dance troupes and professional performance artists. In Jawahar Nagar Colony this costume retailer occupies a noticeable location at on house no. 42. Undoubtedly it is one of the best Fancy Dress Costume Retailers in Jawahar Nagar Colony Varanasi.

Services offered at Samridhi Boutique

The product portfolio of Samridhi Boutique in Jawahar Nagar Colony comprises of a wide range of costumes on rent such as costumes for dance forms like Bharatnatyam Kuchipudi Lavani Kathak Bhangra Salsa Contemporary and belly dancing as well as traditional and region specific attire including Maharashtrian Punjabi South Indian designer sherwani/ pathani/ kurtas designer sarees designer lehengas and ghagra cholis. Just browse through the vast catalogue and narrow down to a costume that meets your specific needs and requirements. You can pair your attire with the right set of accessories and look the part. Pay in Cash.
